channel.title: Data Storage on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Data Storage on FinanClub

item.title: WDC
item.description: score:18 Chances: The separation of Western Digital into two independent, publicly traded companies is a positive move that could unlock value for investors. The appointment of experienced executives to lead the flash memory and HDD businesses shows a strong commitment to the success of both entities.

item.title: PSTG
item.description: score:186 Chances: Pure Storage, Inc. has reported strong financial results, with a 2.8% increase in revenue compared to the previous year. The company’s subscription services revenue has seen a significant increase, indicating a shift in its business model towards more recurring and predictable revenue streams.
